name: Asteroid Snake
description:
A Unity game I made a long time ago, that I finally updated to make it enjoyable. I will probably update one more time or when there are any bugs/glitches that I find. It is a combination of the games Asteroids and Snake.

The HTML version says to press Q to quit, but that only works on the exe version. I just do not feel like making different versions and having to jump back and forth to make small changes.

Also, everything was made by me except for the music.

I will add a Mac and Linux build later. It is just really slow to download.
